page.title: 07ONE DAY IN MY LIFE_2
page.content: At lunch I have 3 sandwiches a drink and something sweet.We sometimes play on the moor at football,armies, hide and seek or climb the rocks we call Rocket Rock,Queensies,Kingsies, Foxhole,Step Rock and Sunbather.If we stay in the playground we play witches farmers,rabbits or cricket. In the afternoon I finish my work,do corrections and project then go home. When I get home I change my clothes. I am allowed to watch T.V for a while. Then I set the table and scrub the potatoes for Mum.We have tea when Dad comes home. After tea we are allowed to go out side for a while.At 7.30 we come in and have a bath.I like that.I come down for my cocoa and something to eat.I say good night to my Mum and Dad.I am allowed to read for a while and I am sleeping by nine o clock.
